title: Version 2.4: Subagents, Skills, and Image Generation
description: Major January 22, 2026 release introducing Subagents for parallel task execution with independent contexts, Agent Skills system for domain-specific workflows via SKILL.md files, Image Generation capabilities using Google Nano Banana Pro model, and Cursor Blame for Enterprise with AI attribution tracking. Also added clarifying questions from agents in any conversation.

community_feedback.quote: CEO of Cursor said they coordinated hundreds of GPT-5.2 agents that built a browser autonomously in 1 week
Building a browser with GPT-5.2 in Cursor that ran uninterrupted for one week with 3M+ lines of code

title: CLI Agent Modes and Cloud Handoff
description: January 16, 2026 update bringing Plan and Ask modes to Cursor CLI, Cloud Handoff for background task continuation with '&' prefix, word-level inline diffs, and one-click MCP authentication with automatic callback handling.

title: Enhanced CLI Agents and Context Management
description: January 14, 2026 update featuring built-in custom agents (Explore, Task, Plan, Code-review) that run in parallel, new model options including GPT-5 mini and GPT-4.1, improved context management with auto-compaction at 95% token limit, /context and /compact commands, and new automation flags for scripting including --silent, --share, and --share-gist.

community_feedback.quote: Dev forums, Reddit, and Hacker News have turned into Copilot group therapy
GitHub Copilot can get you started. It slurped up all of Microsoft SDK and docs and open source libs

title: Version 1.13.14: Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements
description: January 27, 2026 release fixing permanently disconnected cascades bug, following v1.13.13 (Jan 26) that fixed commit message generation and codemaps suggestions, v1.13.12 (Jan 25) adding enterprise-wide command auto-execution allow/deny lists for admins, and v1.13.9 (Jan 16) with GPT-5.2-Codex harness improvements and Windows Group Policy support for Windsurf restrictions.

title: GPT-5.2-Codex Support with Four Reasoning Efforts
description: January 14, 2026 update adding GPT-5.2-Codex model with four reasoning effort levels (low, medium, high, xhigh) optimized for agentic coding and large codebase work over long sessions.

title: Agent Skills Support for Cascade
description: January 12, 2026 release introducing Agent Skills support for Cascade, enabling domain-specific workflows and extensibility.

title: GPT-5.2-Codex Model and v0.89.0+ Updates
description: January 22, 2026 announcement of gpt-5.2-codex as new default API model optimized for agentic coding, along with v0.89.0+ adding 'What's New' notifications, model usage guidance, headless login improvements with automatic device-code login, and custom prompts deprecation. Earlier v0.85.0-v0.87.0 releases added real-time collaboration events and SKILL features.

community_feedback.quote: GPT5 + Codex CLI has been pretty productive for me - compared favorably to Claude 3.7/4.0 via Cursor
Great for greenfield/vibing, bad for iterating on existing projects
My Gemini usage has plummeted down to almost zero and I'm 100% back on Codex
GPT-5-Codex is a better AI researcher than me - parity with motivated undergrad research capabilities

title: Version 0.26.0 with Agent Skills System
description: Released around January 26, 2026 introducing Agent Skills system for extensibility with /agents refresh and /skills reload commands, Rewind feature for conversation history navigation, /introspect command for better introspection, and significant performance improvements including PDF token estimation fixes and automation improvements for scheduled issues.

title: Version 1.3.30 Update
description: Visual Studio Marketplace extension updated to version 1.3.30 on January 26, 2026, maintaining the open-source AI code agent for VS Code with continued development and bug fixes.

title: Devin Review Launch and Enhanced Integration Features
description: Major release introducing Devin Review, a reimagined interface for understanding complex PRs with smart grouping, copy/move detection, and bug catching. Added Repo Setup AI Suggestions for inline setup command guidance, Sessions API enhancements for retrieving session details by ID and sending messages to active sessions, and Session Secrets via API for secure credential management. Also added native Linear integration tool and Kotlin/Protocol Buffers syntax highlighting.
